title: anyone remember when bjergsen got pentakill on mid karma
body: im just wondering as i wasnt very interested league back then but it was the time when bjergsen went mid Karma a couple times and even got a pentakill. i just want to know why it stopped so suddenly. did Riot change Karma or why did bjergsen choose to go mid karma then suddenly stop? i just want to know why karma was a good mid pick for bjergsen then out of nowhere it just stopped because i did not notice any karma nerfs or anything.

replies.body: Karma mid is bad right now because she can't kill tanks. She is good against assasins but that is about it.

> [{quoted}](name=Bussinessbacca,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=hjRWmaTv,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-02T16:38:53.435+0000)
>
> Karma mid is bad right now because she can't kill tanks. She is good against assasins but that is about it.

basically this, and assassins won't be played for much longer because they also can't kill tanks.

I mean LeBlanc is the only one that comes to mind that would stay just because her damage is retarded and AoE but assassins like Ahri/Zed will probably fall out of favor.

guys i wasnt talking about now....

im talking about history. i watn to know why he stopped.

Because the Meta changed. Which all of the above are referring to. 

First, Grail was nerfed. 
Second, Control Mages fell out of favor for assassins.
Third, Tanks come in. Assassin start to drop because of Tanks.
Forth, Tanks are still in and Grail is buffed. Control Mages fall out of favor for tanks because who doesn't want to live forever?
I went through the spring split and found out that Bjergsen only played mid Karma twice. Ever, and that was in the playoffs. Once against CLG for the pentakill, and once against C9 and lost.
yes. that. i want to know why he chose karma?

Probably because at the time Karma was seeing quite a bit of play in the support role (and over in Europe top lane and jungle), and locking in an early Karma would open up counter picks in either the bot lane or mid lane. It was probably a strategic thing over anything else.

karma is still one of the strongest midlaners. her damage is retarded and her utility abnormal. sure, her damage against a fullbuild MR mundo is a little lower than cassios, but i assure you, play karma and you will have alot of fun and lp.
